item.title: Marshmello & Kane Brown - One Thing Right - Key of Em - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song One Thing Right by Marshmello & Kane Brown from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: C, D, Em, G.

item.title: Marshmello & Chvrches - Here With Me - Key of Am - Playtheukewithme
item.description: Play along video for the song Here With Me by Marshmello & Chvrches from the channel Playtheukewithme. Chords used in the song: Am, C, Dm, Em, F, G.

item.title: Marshmello & Lil Peep - Spotlight - About Ukulele
item.description: Play along video for the song Spotlight by Marshmello & Lil Peep from the channel About Ukulele.

item.title: Marshmello & Bastille - Happier - Key of Dm - Kevin Way
item.description: Play along video for the song Happier by Marshmello & Bastille from the channel Kevin Way. Chords used in the song: B♭, C, Dm, F.
